reviews.review: Idk, just kinda dont like the game, wouldent recommend

A lot of hacking, toxic chat, and shitty players. I'm still gonna play tho
THis is a great long term game that you can always play without getting bored
this game is fun when you die
VERY VERYYYY VERY VERYV VEYR YVYEYVYERY FUN ON GOD BRUH
It has reached a higher level of nerfed then r6.

This game is an disgrace to humanity every second of me playing this game feels like me putting toothpicks between my toenails and kicking it against the wall, it makes me feel like i am getting dipped in pure chlorine, it makes me sick, it makes me feel like all my loved ones have been ran over right infront of my eyes and i keep watching and that happens over and over and over again. 

Overall pretty good game 7/10

Gra o charakterze impulsywnym aczkolwiek przyjemna gdy idzie po Twojej myśli, pozytywy i negatywy na jednej linii czasami przeważają się nawzajem, ogólnie rzecz biorąc gra godna polecenia dla każdej osoby w różnym przedziale wiekowym gdyż większości osób gra przypada do gustu. Osobiście polecam w nią zagrać :D
depois que ficou free so aparece hackzinho lixo
this game really makes you feel like osama bin laden

Olá, estou fazendo essa analize negativa pois contrai um vírus para o meu pc por algum motivo desconhecido, o virus que invadiu o meu pc  clonou as minhas informaçoes da steam e divulgou para outra pessoa que acabou usando hack na minha conta, eu tinha comprado 100 reais de skins 2 dias depois que havia recuperado minha conta, e mais 300 reais no passe de batalha do cs, e logo após ter feito isso eu tomei um vac, ou seja: no momento perdi 400 reais mais 55,99 reais ( do prime ) por causa de um hack que nçao sei como contrai. pelo menos ja me livrei dele.
Não sei se algo vai resultar na retirada do meu vac porem não arrecomendo gastar dinheiro com CS GO.
Pretty fkn dogshit game not gonna lie
Super fun game! Could use better anti-cheat but other than that it is an amazing concept! Highly recommend!
es un buen juego lo recomiendo si quieres sentir una gran emosion de manera competitiva
Muito bom chega do trabalho e joga um pouco

I think that the pp-bizon should be nerfedm it is just soo overpowered. Everytime I try to play against someoine with the pp-bizon, I get absolutely shitted on. The gun is just too overpowered
A classic. The quick action and intense tension are great. Now that it's gone free to play, really no reason not to try it out.
I've played this game for too fucking long and i gotta tell you the community is worse than hitler. The AntiCheat is complete dogshit aswell.
